output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF: Yes, contains "CMF 11240017" 2. Refers to candidate: Yes, explicitly mentions Marcel Ciolacu, a presidential candidate 3. Addresses wide population: Yes, targets "bihoreni" and has a paid reach of 3,000-3,999 impressions 4. Electoral objective: Yes, explicitly calls for votes using "votează Marcel Ciolacu la alegerile prezidențiale" 5. Journalism: No, this is clearly campaign material 6. Personal opinion: No, this is a structured campaign message
The post is problematic because: - It's running after the campaign period for presidential elections - Contains direct call to vote for Marcel Ciolacu - Is a paid advertisement reaching thousands - Contains CMF number indicating it's official campaign material - Is clearly electoral propaganda continuing after the legal deadline

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This is clearly electoral propaganda because: - Contains explicit call to vote - Mentions specific candidate - Uses campaign messaging - Has CMF number - Is paid advertisement - Targets wide audience
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea unei reclame platite pe Facebook (ID: 1306321060785441) ce continua propaganda electorala dupa incheierea campaniei pentru alegerile prezidentiale. Postarea contine un indemn explicit de a vota candidatul Marcel Ciolacu la alegerile prezidentiale ("votează Marcel Ciolacu la alegerile prezidențiale"), fiind difuzata dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024. Materialul este unul de propaganda electorala conform Art. 36(7), continand numar CMF (11240017), fiind platit pentru a ajunge la un public larg (3000-3999 impresii), si avand obiectiv electoral explicit.
